INCLUSIVE GAME DESIGN IN ACTION

Our studios take pride in representing authentic and representative characters in our games. As a business, we have committed to creating Inclusive Game Design Ambassadors, provide formal gaming accessibility training opportunities, and representation and media impact workshops for our game creatives to participate in.
